venue.name: Hess Gas - Intersection Mass Pike, Rt 128, and Commonwealth Ave

item.description:
In 2008 we were thwarted by the closure of the road way leading to the top of this beautiful mountain located in the upper west corner of Massachusetts. The road is expected to be open in 2009 and we're going to the top! Click the pic! =>

We will be meeting at the Location Hess Gas - Intersection Mass Pike, Rt 128, and Commonwealth Ave
at 5:30 and picking up more riders at the Concord Rotary on Rt 2 at 6:00 From there we will head straight out Rt 2 to North Adams, MA for breakfast at Linda's. Linda's closes their doors to new customers at 10AM, but we can take our time getting there. Road time will be about 2.5 hours with a pit stop should get us in the door. MAP

After breakfast we will head up the Mountain for a look see, then down the other side and make our way to Tammy's Candy Kettle on Rt 7 in NY State for Lunch. After lunch we will scoot across VT on Rt 9 to Brattleboro, home of the famous Mac & Cheese and pick some up to eat and or bring back home. By then it will be about 3pm and time to head for home, to get there we will take 119 with an optional left on 110 in Westford for those of you who like to finish a great scoot with ice cream at Kimballs.

My Greylock Website

Map of the whole ride 292 fun filled Miles
item.name: Greylock Summit Ride @ 4:30 AM!
